name: Easy Vegan Gravy
description: This Vegan Gravy is so incredibly easy to make. It's the perfect addition to mashed potatoes and only takes 5 minutes!

video.name: Easy Vegan Gravy
video.description: Made with just 6 ingredients, this gravy is ridiculously easy to make.

recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon soy sauce (or use tamari for gluten free)
1/4 cup all purpose flour (or use brown rice flour for gluten free)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a medium sized pot and bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a medium sized pot and bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk over medium-high heat for a couple of minutes, until the gravy thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk over medium-high heat for a couple of minutes, until the gravy thickens.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with mashed potatoes! This gravy keeps well for up to a week in the fridge. Just re-warm, add a little water if too thick, stir and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with mashed potatoes! This gravy keeps well for up to a week in the fridge. Just re-warm, add a little water if too thick, stir and serve.
